description: This file defines the interface IAppManager and its nested INotification struct within the WPEFramework's Exchange namespace. It includes function declarations for managing applications, such as launching, loading, closing, and setting properties, as well as notification callbacks for app events.

classes.name: IAppManager
classes.description: Interface for managing applications within the WPEFramework environment, supporting app lifecycle and property management, and event notifications.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: Callback interface for receiving notifications about application lifecycle events such as installation, uninstallation, state changes, and launch requests.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Register for application management notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregister from application management notifications.

methods.name: GetLaunchableApps
methods.description: Retrieve an iterator for all launchable applications.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Retrieve an iterator for all loaded applications.

methods.name: LaunchApp
methods.description: Launch an application with specified intent and arguments.

methods.name: LoadApp
methods.description: Load an application with specified intent and arguments.

methods.name: PrepareApp
methods.description: Prepare an application for launch.

methods.name: SendMessage
methods.description: Send a message to an application.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Close a running application.

methods.name: TerminateApp
methods.description: Terminate a running application.

methods.name: ClearAppData
methods.description: Clear application data.

methods.name: SetAppFocus
methods.description: Set focus to an application.

methods.name: GetAppMetaData
methods.description: Retrieve metadata of an application.

methods.name: GetAppProperty
methods.description: Get a property value of an application.

methods.name: SetAppProperty
methods.description: Set a property value for an application.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Set maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Get maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Set maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Get maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Set maximum flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Get maximum flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Set maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Get maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
